General.Name: Prodea Real Estate Investment Co.
General.Description: Prodea Real Estate Investment Company Société Anonyme, together with its subsidiaries, invests in, manages, and operates real estate properties primarily in Greece, Italy, and Romania. The company's properties include retail and office properties, and land plots, as well as city hotels, storage spaces, archives, petrol stations, and parking spaces. It primarily serves blue-chip tenants. The company is headquartered in Athens, Greece. Prodea Real Estate Investment Company Société Anonyme is a subsidiary of Invel Real Estate (Netherlands) II B.V.

1.Name: Dr. Aristotelis Dimitrios Karytinos
1.Title: Exec. Vice Chairman of Directors & CEO
